Articles.Content: Does anyone else kinda miss the old desktop icon...or it it just me
I preferred the older one as well.
I personally think this one is alot better. Old one looked cheap.

I personally think this one is alot better. Old one looked cheap.

S:| \'swrong wit you?

I personally think this one is alot better. Old one looked cheap.

Agreed, and it has weird white edges.
The old one was disgusting. White edges, poor quality. I\'m glad we have a new one.
Too me, its like everything in ksp in that update, its going to need some getting used to and I will eventually.
I like the new icon too. Although I was a bit suprised when I saw it, I thought the new icon is gonna be similar to Harv\'s profile picture, a launching rocket.
I like the quality of the new logo, but I liked the theme of the old logo better. Also, I see someone has a good taste in avatars.
